矌矌矌

矌字的基本解释

矌
kuàng
瞎：“打这厮鼻凹眼矌。”

矌
guō
眼睛张大的样子。

矌字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kuàng］
［《廣韻》苦謗切，去宕，溪。］
目无珠，瞎。

矌字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【目字部】　矌； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页820第13
【唐韻】【集韻】?苦謗切，音曠。【玉篇】目無眹也。　又【集韻】古曠切，光去聲。目無色也。　又【集韻】光鑊切，光入聲。【類篇】張目貌。　又【倉頡篇】矖矌，視貌。【江淹·雜體詩】矖矌盡都甸。

矌字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
矌字的起名意思

暂无。

矌
Basic explanation of words
矌
kuàng
Blind: "Hit this guy with sunken nose and eyes."
矌
guō
The eyes are wide open.
矌
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kuàng］
["Guangyun" bitterly slander, go to Dang, Xi. ]
Eyeless, blind.
矌
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Title Department] 　矌; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 820 13
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Hard to slander, and the sound is open. [Jade articles] There is no sight.　[Jiyun] Gu Kuang cuts, the light goes to the sound. Colorless too.　[Jiyun] The light wok cuts, the light enters the sound. [Classes] Zhang Mu's appearance.　[Cangjie Chapter] 矖矌, look at the appearance. 【Jiang Yan·Miscellaneous Poems】It's all over the place.
矌
